author: marcel1no
content: just checking if bigquery's public dataset is really giving me all the eth transactions: a `count(*)` query gives me ~1.2 billion. It seems too little for me?

author: pietjepuk
content: According to etherscan, we're at about 82 TGas so far (cumulative). Not sure what the average transaction is, but if we take the lower bound of 21k then you end up with 3.9 billion

author: pietjepuk
content: So I think the 1.2 billion number might just be correct

author: marcel1no
content: ok perfect, thank you very much
